title: The Dennis Prager Radio Show JULY-12-2013 FRI
description:
The Dennis Prager Radio Show JULY-12-2013 FRI








Prager 20130712  3 Open Lines

Prager H3: Per usual, callers set the agenda. 
 Issues raised include:
 is needing to live life out loud a good thing;
 how do you start and end elevator conversations;
 should conservatives, when talking with people on the left,
    focus the debate on American virtues;
 why is childhood the most memorable period?


Prager 20130712  2 Happiness Hour: Forgiveness

Prager H2: Dr. Stephen Marmer joins the show to discuss forgiveness,
 which is also his new PragerU video.
 Dr. Marmer believes there are three components to forgiveness:
 exoneration, forbearance, and release.
 Dr. Marmer explains the components and callers weigh in.


Prager 20130712  1 The Unhappiness Hour

 There is a new clothing line for lesbian women who want a more masculine look.
